definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Boolean" id="YourCondition">YourCondition</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="64" w="154">This check is necessary, without this, minecraft crashes</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="world_data_isremote"></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">EntityPlayer</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_haspotioneffect"><field name="potion">CUSTOM:IframeEffect</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="52" w="141">Your custom shader is applied here</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="get_shader_group"></block></value><value name="B"><block type="shader_null"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="load_shader"><value name="shader_location"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">craft_kaisen:shaders/post/black_and_white.json</field><comment pinned="false" h="66" w="166">Here you need to enter the file location of your custom shader</comment></block></value></block></statement></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">NEQ</field><value name="A"><block type="get_shader_group"></block></value><value name="B"><block type="shader_null"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="take_off_shader"></block></statement></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
